channel.title: cmbu on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in cmbu on DefinIT

item.title: Goodbye VMware PSO...
item.description: Autumn seems to be a time for the winds of change to blow through our industry, and this year that’s true for me. TL;DR - I’m leaving VMware PSO to join the Cloud Management Business Unit as a Technical Marketing Manager for Cloud Automation! It’s been a little over two years since I joined VMware as a Senior Conusltant in the EMEA NSX Practice, and in that time I’ve enjoyed some great opportunities, worked with some great people and technologies.
